column5: The program is created to prepare graduate students for PhD studies. It is specialized in the domains of research of the five teams of the Laboratory of Mathematics of Besançon : functional analysis, numerical analysis and scientific computing, partial differential equations, probability and statistics, number theory.Main research areas:functional analysis, numerical analysis and scientific computing, partial differential equations, probability and statistics, number theory.Career pathsThe program targets careers such as:University ProfessorResearch EngineerGrantsMany scholarships will be awarded each year to high quality foreign students.
